priceLinkedOrderedMerchandiseTop5: (SELECT'0~5'AS fromKey,koName AS toKey,COUNT(*)AS value FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise INNER JOIN proxy.merchandise ON orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE(saleAmount DIV quantity)<50000 AND status NOT IN('CANCELED','UNPAID')GROUP BY koName ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5)UNION ALL(SELECT'5~10'AS fromKey,koName AS toKey,COUNT(*)AS value FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise INNER JOIN proxy.merchandise ON orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE(saleAmount DIV quantity)>=50000 AND(saleAmount DIV quantity)<100000 AND status NOT IN('CANCELED','UNPAID')GROUP BY koName ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5)UNION ALL(SELECT'20~'AS fromKey,koName AS toKey,COUNT(*)AS value FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise INNER JOIN proxy.merchandise ON orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE(saleAmount DIV quantity)>=100000 AND(saleAmount DIV quantity)<200000 AND status NOT IN('CANCELED','UNPAID')GROUP BY koName ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5)UNION ALL(SELECT'10~20'AS fromKey,koName AS toKey,COUNT(*)AS value FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise INNER JOIN proxy.merchandise ON orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE(saleAmount DIV quantity)>=200000 AND status NOT IN('CANCELED','UNPAID')GROUP BY koName ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5)
